biotools.summary: Tool for predicting the possible movements (ie. conformational changes and other structural changes) of macromolecules. This tool allows users to compute, visualize, and analyse low-frequency normal modes of a protein.

bioschemas.name: ElNemo
bioschemas.summary: Tool for predicting the possible movements (ie. conformational changes and other structural changes) of macromolecules. This tool allows users to compute, visualize, and analyse low-frequency normal modes of a protein.
